wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Holmes (19 February 1894 – 7 May 1964) was a British ice hockey player who competed in the 1924 Winter Olympics. He was a member of the British ice hockey team, which won the bronze medal.  He went on to become a pioneer missionary in Rwanda.

response: * Geoffrey Holmes (1894–1964), British ice hockey player sometimes listed as George Holmes
